ValidationRule.description: Only allow trial opportunities to advance to Closing or beyond if the Active ELD/HOS Project flag is marked as yes or no (not unknown).
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND (NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), $Profile.Name <> "Order Operations Admin", ISPICKVAL(Type,"Free Trial Opportunity"), ISCHANGED(StageName), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closing"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Ready to Ship"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ), TEXT(Hours_of_Service_flag__c)='Unknown' , Express_Flag__c =0 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Cannot allow the trial opportunity to advance to Closing or beyond if the Active ELD/HOS Project flag is unknown (not yet marked as yes or no).
